00022 //These two macros make sure that you don't enable the global interrupt
00023 //if it was disabled already
00024 #define CLI unsigned char status_sreg = (SREG & 0x80); cli();
00025 #define SEI if (status_sreg) sei();     
00026 
00027 // CPU clock speed
00028 #define F_CPU        14745000                           // 14.745MHz processor
00029 #define CYCLES_PER_US ((F_CPU+500000)/1000000)  // cpu cycles per microsecond
00030 
00031 #define asm(x) __asm__ __volatile__ (x)
